mapper.sql: SELECT IC.EVLT_ITEM_NO /* PrEvltItemCd.evltItemListBase */ , IC.EVLT_ITEM_NM , IC.USE_YN , COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(STD_CTG_NO) FROM PR_STD_CTG_EVLT_ITEM_INFO GROUP BY EVLT_ITEM_NO HAVING EVLT_ITEM_NO = IC.EVLT_ITEM_NO),0) AS STD_CTG_MAP_CNT , IC.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(IC.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , IC.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(IC.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_EVLT_ITEM_CD IC WHERE 1 = 1 AND IC.SYS_REG_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{regStartDtm} || ' 000000', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') AND IC.SYS_REG_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{regEndDtm} || ' 235959', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') AND IC.EVLT_ITEM_NM LIKE #{evltItemNm} || '%' ORDER BY EVLT_ITEM_NO DESC
